com.courseApp.entity

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.courseApp.entity.User

  • public class User
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class representing the users of this app. User has a username for identification purpose.

      • User

        public User(java.lang.String username,
            java.lang.String raw_password)
        Constructor for register user, instantiate a User entity. It will generate empty lists for User attributes.
        Parameters:
        username - username
        raw_password - unencrypted password

      • checkPassword

        public boolean checkPassword(java.lang.String password)
        Check the password with the encrypted password string in the database.
        Parameters:
        password - raw password
        Returns:
        true iff the password is correct, otherwise, false.
